voicePlay.title: Play Steel Darts using your voice
voicePlay.slogan: Stay in flow and improve your game.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work in noisy environments?
faqs.answer: VoicePlay was developed for quiet to silent environments, especially for practicing. Noisy environments with multiple people speaking simultaneously can lead to instability.

faqs.question: How can I play in a noisy environment? (not recommended)
faqs.answer: You can disable auto-commit, configuring VoicePlay to require separate confirmation for each voice command.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work without an internet connection?
How many devices can I use my DartSense account on simultaneously?
faqs.answer: DartSense accounts are limited to ONE active device at a time. If you log in on a new device, you will be automatically logged out from the previous one.

faqs.question: What happens if an account is shared?
faqs.answer: Violations of the "ONE active device at a time" policy or any form of account sharing can lead to account suspension.

faqs.question: Have questions about billing or need assistance with payment?
faqs.answer: For billing inquiries and assistance with payments, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1227611762719854652/1227616575415255051).

faqs.question: Experiencing technical issues or want to report a bug?
faqs.answer: For technical support and bug reporting, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1227611762719854652/1227616480519127124).

footer.slogan: Perfect your game while DartSense handles counting.
